user_query: I'm organizing a company retreat in the mountains. Please provide the coordinates for the lodge in Aspen. Also, fetch a map tile with English labels for the lodge location. Additionally, suggest some team-building activities and nearby hiking trails to make the retreat memorable.

TaskList.description: Fetch the coordinates for the lodge in Aspen.
Get a map tile for the lodge location with English labels.
Suggest team-building activities for the retreat.
List nearby hiking trails for participants.
